Description: Designed to help you achieve more with innovative Office apps, intelligent cloud services, and world-class security.
Name: Microsoft Office 365

Methods.Name: List Sites
Methods.Description: Lists all sites.

Methods.Name: List Site's Drives
Methods.Description: To list the document libraries for a site, your app requests the drives relationship on the Site.

Methods.Name: List New Emails By User
Methods.Description: List emails from the specified user's inbox that have been created since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Message Attachments
Methods.Description: List the attachments of the specified message.

Methods.Name: List Mail Folders
Methods.Description: List a user's mail folders.

Methods.Name: Get Message Attachment (Raw)
Methods.Description: Retrieve the raw content of the specified attachment.

Methods.Name: List New Emails By Folder
Methods.Description: List a user's emails from the specified folder that have been created since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Emails By User
Methods.Description: List emails from the specified user's inbox.

Methods.Name: List Emails By Folder
Methods.Description: List a user's emails from the specified folder.

Methods.Description: Get a calendar.

Methods.Name: List Calendars
Methods.Description: List all the calendars of a user.

Methods.Description: Update a calendar.

Methods.Description: Create a calendar.

Methods.Name: Delete Calendar
Methods.Description: Delete a calendar.

Methods.Name: List Calendar Events
Methods.Description: List all the calendar events for a user between two dates.

Methods.Description: Create an event in the specified calendar.

Methods.Name: Get User Calendar Availability
Methods.Description: Get the free/busy availability information for a user.

Methods.Description: Get a user's licenses.

Methods.Description: Gets the schedules for all users chosen.

Methods.Description: Get a user's manager.

Methods.Description: List all users.

Methods.Name: Get User By Email
Methods.Description: Get a user from the email address provided.

Methods.Name: List Subscriptions
Methods.Description: Retrieve the properties and relationships of webhook subscriptions, based on the app ID, the user, and the user's role with a tenant.

Methods.Name: Webhook
Methods.Description: General purpose webhook receiver for Microsoft Office 365. Please see the documentation (https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/webhooks?view=graph-rest-1.0) for details on the Resource types available.

Methods.Name: Download Drive Item
Methods.Description: Retrieve the specified item file content. Use this method with the Download URL field returned by Get Metadata methods.

Methods.Description: Lists all Drives the authenticated user has access to.

Methods.Name: List Rows
Methods.Description: Get a list of tablerow objects
